value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|The Day of Devotion is finally upon
us! I can now take center stage and
dazzle in my astounding outfit!$k$pThe chosen warrior of love and
flowers must spare no effort in
seeking out those who need saving!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|There you are, honey. I've been
looking all over for you!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Oh, hello, Mother. Did you need
something from me?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Where are you running off to during
this celebration? I thought we could
check out the festivities together.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Erm... I appreciate the offer, but
I was just about to search for—$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|For someone more fun than your
boring Mama? Just tear my heart out
and stomp on it, why don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Mother, please! I just thought that...
Well, being led around by one's
parents isn't the most heroic look...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Oh, sweetheart... Nobody's gonna
think less of you for spending this
day with your dear Mother.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Mother, you're hugging too tight... I
c-can't...breathe... Urk! I just need
some space, all right?!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Hey! Get back here, mister!$k$p

$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|The chosen warrior of love and
flowers, on the run, ends up
unable to save anyone...$k$pHis sacred duty to convey affection
and gratitude to those closest to
him, left incomplete...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Ah ha! I've got you now, my sweet!
You're not getting away from me
this time!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Very well, Mother. I submit to my
fate.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Huh? What's gotten into you?
I was expecting a more spirited
response than that.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|I fear that I have made a grave
error in my understanding of
the Day of Devotion.$k$pIt's not about the chosen warrior
of love and flowers swooping in
to save the day.$k$pIt's about appreciating the friends
and family who take care of you
and ask for nothing in return.$k$pFamily like you. So, thank you for
being there for me, Mother. Then,
now, and in the future.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Oh, Owain... *sniff* You really are a
sweet boy, you know that?$k$pWhat's the mother of the chosen
warrior of love and flowers to do?
You're just too precious!$k$pYou're also good for my training! My
legs have gotten pretty strong from
chasing you around. Heehee!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Oh, Mother... You never change.$k$pI found this flower while, um, out
exploring, and it made me think of
you. Please accept it.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|Aww, it's beautiful! Thank you,
honey. OK, let's try this again. Ahem.$k$pHey there, Owain! Wanna check out
the festivities together?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Why, of course, Mother! Nothing
would make the chosen warrior of
love and flowers happier.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リズ,ch04_11_Liz_F_Valentine22,Face|That's what I like to hear! Now give
me your hand so I can lead the way!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Valentine22,Face|Erm, on second thought... Hey,
slow down!$k$p
